StockTradeDataSql.IsDailyExistSql: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' AND table_schema = 'dawnquant.ashare.stock.dailytd' and table_name='tablename'
StockTradeDataSql.CreateSql: CREATE TABLE `tablename` ( `TradeDateTime` datetime(6) NOT NULL, `Open` double NOT NULL, `Close` double NOT NULL, `PreClose` double DEFAULT NULL, `High` double NOT NULL, `Low` double NOT NULL, `Volume` double NOT NULL, `Amount` double NOT NULL, `Turnover` double NOT NULL, `TurnoverFree` double NOT NULL, `AdjustFactor` double NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TradeDateTime`), KEY `indexname` (`TradeDateTime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;

StockDailyIndicatorSql.IsExistSql: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' AND table_schema = 'dawnquant.ashare.stock.dailyindicator' and table_name='tablename'
StockDailyIndicatorSql.CreateSql: CREATE TABLE `tablename` ( `TradeDate` datetime(6) NOT NULL, `Close` double NOT NULL, `Turnover` double NOT NULL, `TurnoverFree` double NOT NULL, `VolumeRatio` double NOT NULL, `PE` double DEFAULT NULL, `PETTM` double DEFAULT NULL, `PB` double NOT NULL, `PS` double NOT NULL, `PSTTM` double NOT NULL, `DV` double NOT NULL, `DVTTM` double NOT NULL, `TotalShare` double NOT NULL, `FloatShare` double NOT NULL, `FreeShare` double NOT NULL, `TotalMarketValue` double NOT NULL, `CirculateMarketValue` double NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TradeDate`), KEY `indexname` (`TradeDate`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;

THSIndexTradeDataSql.IsDailyExistSql: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' AND table_schema = 'dawnquant.ashare.stock.thsindexdailytd' and table_name='tablename'
THSIndexTradeDataSql.CreateSql: CREATE TABLE `tablename` ( `TradeDateTime` datetime(6) NOT NULL, `Open` double NOT NULL, `Close` double NOT NULL, `PreClose` double DEFAULT NULL, `High` double NOT NULL, `Low` double NOT NULL, `Volume` double NOT NULL, `Amount` double NOT NULL, `Turnover` double NOT NULL, `AvgClose` double NOT NULL, `Change` double NOT NULL, `PctChange` double NOT NULL, `TotalMV` double NOT NULL, `FloatMV` double NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TradeDateTime`), KEY `indexname` (`TradeDateTime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
